content:
Sure, here's an example of how you could include all your experience in your CV:

[Full Name]
[Address]
[Phone Number]
[Email]

Objective:
[Your career objective or a brief summary of your professional goals.]

Education:
[Your highest degree and the institution you earned it from. Include any relevant certifications or courses.]

Experience:

CTO, XYZ Company
[Dates of Employment]

* Developed and executed technology strategies that supported the company's overall goals and objectives.
* Led the development of innovative software solutions that increased efficiency and improved customer satisfaction.
* Managed a team of engineers and developers to ensure projects were completed on time and within budget.

Freelance Senior System Engineer and Architect, Sindiana
[Dates of Employment]

* Led the preliminary and critical design reviews for a software simulation project for RAFAEL, resulting in successful implementation and launch of the product.
* Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop system requirements and design specifications.
* Worked closely with clients to ensure project deliverables met their expectations and requirements.

Freelance System Architect, Israel Air Force
[Dates of Employment]

* Defined the digital architecture and concept for optimizing the recruiting process and collaborating data and analyzing multi-sensors (such flight simulator, digital test and interview, and training flights telemetric data) into ML and decision formula that supported the decision entity with the training process of different professions and roles (such pilots, technicians, etc.) in Israel Air Force.
* Worked with a team of developers to implement the ML algorithms and decision formulas into the training process.
* Successfully delivered a product that improved the efficiency of the recruiting process and the quality of training for various roles within the Air Force.

Skills:
[List any relevant technical skills, such as programming languages, software tools, or hardware systems.]

References:
[Include the names and contact information of professional references, if desired.]

Note: This is just an example, and you can modify it according to your needs and preferences.
